titleStmt.title: Lex Pacifica, or, Gods own law of determining controversies explain'd and asserted in a sermon preached at Dorchester at the Assizes holden there for the county of Dorset, August 5, 1664 / by John Martin ...
titleStmt.author: Martin, John, 1619-1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Richard Royston and are to be sold by John Courtney ...,
